definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: The child in whose veins flows the blood of William Turner? where?
sentences.chinese: 那個威廉特納的親生骨肉呢？

sentences.english: However, why did these parents abandon their own babies?
sentences.chinese: 但父母究竟爲什麼要丟棄自己的親生骨肉？

sentences.english: I cared for my puppy as if I were raising a son.
sentences.chinese: 我對待我的小狗的方法就像親生骨肉一樣。
